title: Kolohe Kai - This is the Life
description:
Kolohe Kai is a fresh, new island music group from the Windward side of Oahu whose reggae-influenced style is inviting and infectious.

With members still in high school, this young group caught the attention of Go Aloha Entertainment who teamed them with the successful production team of Imua Garza and Brett Ortone (Rebel Souljahz, Opihi Pickers) who soon had them in the recording studio working on a project.

The result is This Is The Life, the bandÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s debut CD, to be released in September 2009. This Is The Life contains 11 all original songs composed by Kolohe Kai leader Roman De Peralta, influenced by RomanÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s family, faith, love of surfing, and love of life.

Kolohe KaiÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s music is a breath of fresh air with themes of innocence and youthful enthusiasm, young love and all-around fun.
